mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.created_at AS createdAt, f.view_count AS viewCount, u.nickname AS writerNickname, u.username AS writerUsername FROM freeboards f JOIN users u ON f.writer = u.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC

SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.created_at AS createdAt, f.view_count AS viewCount, u.nickname AS writerNickname, u.username AS writerUsername FROM freeboards f JOIN users u ON f.writer = u.id WHERE f.id = #{id}
